changeSet.id: Create updated distribution view for return event
changeSet.createView: select item.identifier as identifier, item.specimen_id as specimen_id, item.quantity as quantity, item.status as status, item.return_quantity as return_quantity, item.return_container_id as return_container_id, item.return_cont_pos_one as return_cont_pos_one, item.return_cont_pos_two as return_cont_pos_two, item.return_cont_pos_one_str as return_cont_pos_one_str, item.return_cont_pos_two_str as return_cont_pos_two_str, item.return_user_id as return_user_id, item.return_date as return_date, item.return_comments as return_comments, ord.name as name, ord.requester_id as requester_id, ord.distributor_id as distributor_id, ord.execution_date as execution_date, ord.comments as comments, dp.short_title as dp_short_title from os_order_items item inner join os_orders ord on item.order_id = ord.identifier inner join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on ord.distribution_protocol_id = dp.identifier where ord.status != 'PENDING'

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: create or replace view os_container_hierarchy_view as select h.descendent_id as container_id, group_concat(distinct a.name order by a.identifier separator ' -> ') as hierarchy from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers a on a.identifier = h.ancestor_id where a.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by h.descendent_id;

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: create or replace view cont_hierarchy_view as ( select h.descendent_id as container_id, LISTAGG(a.name, '->') within group( order by a.identifier) as hierarchy from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers a on a.identifier = h.ancestor_id where a.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by h.descendent_id )

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: View to assist query containers based on ancestor container names
changeSet.sql: create or replace view os_container_ancestors_view as select h.descendent_id as container_id, a.name as ancestor_name from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers a on a.identifier = h.ancestor_id where a.activity_status != 'Disabled';
